attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Shah, who is 96 years old, was the victim of an unprovoked attack on a tram leaving him blind in one eye. His attacker was given a three year supervision order escaping a custodial sentance. His attacker Stephen Gordon left court laughing. Give Mr Shah Justice have this case reviewed in order that the public can be safe guarded and justice be served.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
